definitions.example: I checked the list again and everything is done.

A:What do you want to do at the amusement park?
B:Everything!

definitions.definition: A state of well-being (from all parts of the whole).
definitions.example: She wasn't feeling well this morning but now everything is fine.
It took everything in me to resist the temptation to skip work on my birthday.
I can't believe I made it in time - timing is everything!
